pullrequest.title: Joint control menu read current values

content.raw:
and here's the backtrace I see in gzclient after switching between a few models and changing the gains:

~~~
Thread 7 "gzclient" received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fffc1c0d700 (LWP 23644)]
gazebo::gui::JointPIDPosControl::SetPGain (this=0x0, _pGain=3) at /home/docker/ws/src/gazebo/gazebo/gui/JointControlWidget.cc:155
155	  this->dataPtr->pGainSpin->setValue(_pGain);
(gdb) bt
#0  gazebo::gui::JointPIDPosControl::SetPGain (this=0x0, _pGain=3) at /home/docker/ws/src/gazebo/gazebo/gui/JointControlWidget.cc:155
#1  0x00007ffff725d24e in gazebo::gui::JointControlWidget::OnControllerResponse (this=0x14f37d0, _rep=..., _result=<optimized out>) at /home/docker/ws/src/gazebo/gazebo/gui/JointControlWidget.cc:348
#2  0x00007ffff7269f41 in std::function<void (ignition::msgs::JointCmd const&, bool)>::operator()(ignition::msgs::JointCmd const&, bool) const (__args#1=true, __args#0=..., this=0x4e8c3f0) at /usr/include/c++/5/functional:2267
#3  ignition::transport::ReqHandler<ignition::msgs::StringMsg, ignition::msgs::JointCmd>::NotifyResult (this=0x4e8c310, _rep=..., _result=<optimized out>) at /usr/include/ignition/transport3/ignition/transport/ReqHandler.hh:258
#4  0x00007ffff38520c0 in ignition::transport::NodeShared::RecvSrvResponse() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libignition-transport3.so.3
#5  0x00007ffff38570e0 in ignition::transport::NodeShared::RunReceptionTask() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libignition-transport3.so.3
#6  0x00007ffff5c79c80 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#7  0x00007ffff469b6ba in start_thread (arg=0x7fffc1c0d700) at pthread_create.c:333
#8  0x00007ffff56e882d in clone () at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:109
~~~
content.html:
and here's the backtrace I see in gzclient after switching between a few models and changing the gains:

Thread 7 "gzclient" received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fffc1c0d700 (LWP 23644)]
gazebo::gui::JointPIDPosControl::SetPGain (this=0x0, _pGain=3) at /home/docker/ws/src/gazebo/gazebo/gui/JointControlWidget.cc:155
155   this->dataPtr->pGainSpin->setValue(_pGain);
(gdb) bt
